channel.title: Need a very powerfull anti syi not name blocker..-.-
channel.description:
I have a nice server 15+ people on every day running 24/7, and sometimes there comes a syi ruining my server:(
and a cheat client dude who goes invicebel, how to fix these things:(

item.title: Need a very powerfull anti syi not name blocker..-.-
item.dc:creator: @elijah101 elijah101

item.title: Need a very powerfull anti syi not name blocker..-.-
item.dc:creator: @baspwnzz baspwnzz
item.description:
@baspwnzz wrote:

i get this error when i compile

client.java:18693: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable checkuid
location: class client
if (checkuid != 7
^
client.java:18696: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable LoggedOut
location: class client
LoggedOut = false
^
2 errors
Finished!
Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 29, 2009, 04:16:13 pm[/size][hr]i tried to change UID but i still get error tho what to change UID ??

i made From UID Checkuid

bcus before i got ERROR THo so i tried that and loggedout gave error to:(

item.title: Need a very powerfull anti syi not name blocker..-.-
item.dc:creator: @gon3d34d123 gon3d34d123
item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

[quote=“reverce, post:3, topic:291783”][quote author=gon3d34d123 link=topic=385581.msg2890911#msg2890911 date=1248903576]
@ cheat client:
get the GUI code from his client and block it, (You could also IP ban him)

and for the SYI, Neither create so that the server only allows connections from your client or ban the host he’s SYI’n from.
You can get the ip he’s using through character files.

[/quote]
What ur telling is crap,
Read what the topics says,
he probly wont know how to block the cheat client, explain him how to ,
And about the ip thats not a sl. Becous u yust change the ip right?
…[/quote]

He changed topic name ass.

And i said, Ban the host.

Gf noob.

item.title: Need a very powerfull anti syi not name blocker..-.-
item.dc:creator: @gon3d34d123 gon3d34d123
item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

@ cheat client:
get the GUI code from his client and block it, (You could also IP ban him)

and for the SYI, Neither create so that the server only allows connections from your client or ban the host he’s SYI’n from.
You can get the ip he’s using through character files.
